info.title: Text Processing
info.description: The WebKnox text processing API lets you process (natural) language texts. You can detect the text's language, the quality of the writing, find entity mentions, tag part-of-speech, extract dates, extract locations, or determine the sentiment of the text.

get.description: Detect spelling errors in the text.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the given text.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text that should be auto-corrected.

get.description: Detect the language of a natural language text.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text for which the language should be determined.

get.description: Tag a given text with part-of-speech tags (POS tags).

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text for which the POS tags should be found.

get.description: Detect the sentiment (positive or negative) of a given text. The detection works for English and German texts.

parameters.name: contextWords
parameters.description: Optionally consider only sentences that contain a context word for the sentiment detection.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the given text (en=English, de=German).

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text for which the sentiment should be detected.

post.description: Detect the sentiment of a text.

get.description: Extract dates from a given text.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text from which dates should be extracted.

get.description: Extract entities such as movies or people in a given text.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text in which entities should be detected.

get.description: Extract names of locations in the given text.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text from which locations should be extracted.

post.description: Determine the quality of an article.

get.description: Split a given text into sentences.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the text. Currently English (en) and German (de) are supported.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to split into sentences.

post.description: Split a given text into sentences.

get.description: Extract a summary of a text.

parameters.name: keepRatio
parameters.description: The ratio of the text that should be kept.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text which should be summarized.
